snippet: Phil Kline’s “dreamcitynine,” a piece commissioned by Lincoln Center Out of Doors for the composer John Cage’s centenary, had its premiere Friday at Lincoln Center’s Hearst Plaza.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews Philip Kline's dreamcitynine musical installation, part of the Lincoln Center Out of Doors Festival.
lead_paragraph: Phil Kline’s “dreamcitynine,” a piece commissioned by Lincoln Center Out of Doors for the composer John Cage’s centenary, had its premiere Friday at Lincoln Center’s Hearst Plaza.

headline.seo: Phil Kline’s ‘dreamcitynine’ at Lincoln Center Out of Doors
